title: 47: How Gratitude Rewires Your Brain
description:
Gratitude is scientifically proven to improve how you feel and rewire your brain. I know for me it's one of the most powerful habits I practice every single day. In this episode I will show you how to implement gratitude into your daily life and exactly how it can rewire your brain.

 

Join our growing community here: www.Kwikbrain.com
